name: Prep-Set-Glow Hydrating Glowy Setting Spray
about: What it is: Glowy setting spray with skincare benefits that preps, hydrates and illuminates the skin, while fixing makeup with a soft-focus, natural finish...Highlighted Ingredients:.- Vitamin E: Conditions, soothes and hydrates the skin..- Caffeine: Reduces puffiness and helps with the appearance of dark circles..- Antioxidants: Helps form a barrier on the skin to protect against pollution...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Prep-Set-Glow is a Vegan and Cruelty-Free hydrating mist that contains light-reflecting particles. This multi-use spray can be used to prep the skin before applying make-up, set a finished look or add a radiant gloss anywhere. It is also 100% Vegan.
ingredients: Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerine, Butylene Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated castor oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polysorbate 20, PEG-20 Glyceryl Laurate, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Caffeine, Arginine, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Parfum, Chlorophenesin, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prep: Spritz on bare skin to hydrate and soothe skin, and add a lit-from-within look to your complexion...-Set: Spritz on top of your finished makeup for a soft-focus fix...-Glow: Spritz anywhere that you want a little added luster (don't forget shoulders and du00e9colletage)...-Mua Tip: Use to dampen brushes before using powder products to enhance pigments, reduce fall-out and allow easier eyeshadow packing.

shades.shade_descriptor: perfect champagne glow to make any skin tone radiant and glossy
beautiful bronze glow to bring a more sun kissed gloss to any skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i was choosing between this and the milk hydrating dew spray and i ended up returning the milk one, this is multi use and can be layered a prep and then set, itu2019s perfect great value and leave such a nice plump finish to my dry skin, i never have to worry about creasing or dry patches with my makeup anymore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the glow this product gives, perfect.  The sprayer is not even and the product comes out blotchy but still works.  Bummer, I am going to give this to my niece, the scent is so strong and cheap perfume smelling.  Why on a face product?

reviews.review_title: Gives a beautiful healthy glow look!

reviews.review_text: After finishing 2 bottles of this yes I love this as a my finishing touch! One thing though, if you spray too much you can look a bit oily and can get all over your hair. Gives a beautiful glow with some sparkle but not too much! Paris perfectly with the iconic primer.

reviews.review_text: I like the way this makes my skin look after setting powder but it doesnu2019t make my makeup LAST. I use this, let it dry, then go in with the one/size for longevity. This is a similar formula to CT, just luminous. I had the mini first, then bought the full size.

reviews.review_text: I bought this product because it was supposed to be glowing and not come out very patchy. It came out very, very patchy to the point where it would have so much glow on my forehead and nowhere else. It did not keep my makeup in place or do anything was not very good product for me, it came out so patchy sprayed very hard on my face ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a love-it-or-hate-it product, but I LOVE IT. The fragrance is delicious, and gives a beautiful, juicy hydrated glow to the skin. Make sure to shake it so the glitter blends with the spray. I have dry skin, so I'm not sure how much you'd enjoy this if you have oily skin or just like a more matte look, but this makes me look like I drink a gallon of water every hour. The glitter can also be a bit messy, so be mindful of what you're wearing when you spray it - all my work shirts are super glittery now. Would make a stunning body glow as well I think. I only regret I didn't purchase the full size.

reviews.review_text: This is a good product but it just isn't my cup of tea. This product left my skin shiny and made me feel oily. However, I much prefer to have my skin matte or natural. If you like the glowy/oily type look this would be a great product to try. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have using this product for about 2 weeks and really like it. It keeps my makeup looking like itu2019s freshy done all day. This leaves a nice glow on my skin, and very nice for summer look. The smell is also good.

reviews.review_text: It kind of makes you look oily I had to wear powder for the first time after using this and my skin is super dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great setting spray with a hint of that summer glow. Tiny specks of glitter that are subtle enough that you can build with, Without making me look sweaty instead. Perfect for a natural/dewy look. Smells so good too and kept makeup in place without drying me out.

reviews.review_title: Not worth it even with 20% off...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a glitter spray, and not in beachy Nuxe body oil way. The pump nozzle on the mini is also thick probably to allow for the glitter to pass through. The kind of spray that 70% alcohol from the drug store has. However, it just applies the spray way too patchy, or makes you want to use a 2nd or 3rd pump which will make you look like Edward Cullen in the sunlight.  The spray also has a very floral scent. Like roses mixed with something else. Unlike other scented makeup it doesn't evaporate with time. So you just smell this smell on your face all day. If you wear perfume, depending on what perfume you wear, this scent will clash heavily if it isn't already floral.  Buy something else, or use a sheer highlighter all over your face, you will get the same effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am darker skinned and this product left a beautiful glow on my skin after I applied my makeup. It melted my makeup flawlessly and helped it to last while I was at a concert.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my morning routine now!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this setting spray for about two weeks now. I absolutely love it! It feels like a splash of moisture on your face and keeps your makeup looking like it's freshly done all day. It has just the right amount of the dewy look without looking like your face is plastered in makeup. I have used other setting sprays where they feel like hairspray or sticky and this one does not all all. Highly recommend! Great price point also!

reviews.review_text: LOVE ! I had this sitting from a set for quite a while before I randomly tried it and now I use it every day, I loveeee the scent but I donu2019t think itu2019s too strong. I get compliments on how my skin looks glowy (I use this on top of the Danessa yummy serum and the skin tint) itu2019s my go to every day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just when I thought it couldnu2019t get any better! Not only is this perfect for setting your makeup, it gives your skin the prettiest, dewiest glow! Made with Vitamin E, Caffeine & Antioxidants, it hydrates the skin, reduces puffiness and helps to protect the skin barrier from damage. Even when your not wearing makeup you can spritz this on your face for a summery dewy glow, but it definitely locks in makeup for an all-night glam when used as a setting spray. I am absolutely thrilled with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite setting spray. It keeps your makeup on, smells nice, and even has a little glitter! My skin looks so shiny after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for an overall subtle glow. I love pairing this with a glowy look because it ties it all together. The specks of glitter are so small it looks seamless. You can customize how glowy by adding or doing less sprays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great! Leaves your skin looking glowy and dewy,

reviews.review_title: A Nice Change to My Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Setting sprays are not something that I normally used, so I was excited to get the opportunity to try the Iconic Prep-Set-Glow Hydrating Setting Spray to see if it is something I should add to my routine. After using it for about a week and a half, I can officially say that it is okay. I mostly used it in the morning before going to work or on the weekends before going out. I would use my cleanser, toner, tinted moisturizer, cover any odd marks, and reduce the effect of the dark circles under my eyes. Just light touches, but nothing too heavy. Then I would finish with the Iconic setting spray. It has a nice, light smell to it. I am not a fan of anything overpowering, so I am glad that it is not too heavy. Some other products are so strong that it affects my allergies, but this one doesnu2019t. When using this product, it does make my face stay fresher, longer throughout the day. I didnu2019t notice that my face was that much more moisturized, but the work covering my dark circles usually looks a little ragged at the end of the day, but now it looks a little better. Overall, I wouldnu2019t say that this product is life changing, but I am starting to see the benefit and I will definitely continue using the product with heavier looks to see if I notice an even bigger benefit.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Original - perfect champagne glow to make any skin tone radiant and glossy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product in exchange for my review. I have been using this product for 2 weeks and love how multi-use it is. My favorite is to use it as a prepping spray as it provides lasting hydration with the skins and makes my foundation sit well on my skin. I also use it as a setting spray and it gives the prettiest glow to the face. Lastly, you can also use this on any part of the body where you want some extra glow and once it sets it stays there for the rest of the day. This is a must for the summer!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The glow that it leaves behind is incredible. Iu2019ve had issues with sprays drying down my skin but this isnu2019t an issue at all. Out with old and in with the new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to enjoy this product given its claims of delivering a radiant glossy finish but found that it didnu2019t no matter how much I applied. It didnu2019t leave a shimmer for better or wish ( I know shimmer is divisive but given the stunning look of the bottle was hoping for such ) It does delivery a generic setting effect but didnu2019t notice any increased longevity of my makeup which is shame given its fragrance that I didnu2019t enjoy. Iu2019d say the scent is generic cosmetic fragrance. Luckily I didnu2019t pay for this product and donu2019t feel like it worth the price for the sort of middle of the road effect.

reviews.review_title: I had hope but itu2019s not a good makeup setter

Itu2019s fine enough for no makeup and just a little glow for the bare skin, but it wonu2019t keep your makeup in place for long term

The smell to the product gives out just freshness so itu2019s perfect for your face not over or underwhelming. I think it works for both day and evening wear.
